articles.title: Kartel lideri El Mencho Meksika’da öldürüldü
articles.title_tr: Kartel lideri El Mencho Meksika’da öldürüldü
articles.summary: Meksika'nın en büyük suç örgütlerinden Jalisco Yeni Nesil Karteli (CJNG) lideri "El Mencho" lakaplı Nemesio Oseguera, düzenlenen askeri operasyonda öldürüldü. Kartel üyeleri birçok kentte araçları ateşe verirken, Guadalajara Uluslararası Havalimanı'na da saldırdı.

articles.title: Xbox President Explains Why She Left The Company So Suddenly And Gives Update On Next-Gen Xbox
articles.title_tr: Xbox President Explains Why She Left The Company So Suddenly And Gives Update On Next-Gen Xbox
articles.summary: Xbox players and industry observers were surprised last week when Microsoft Gaming CEO Phil Spencer announced his retirement, with Xbox president Sarah Bond also announcing plans to leave the company. Now, Bond has shared her reasons for stepping away from the company.In a lengthy post on her LinkedIn page, Bond wrote that she committed to staying with Xbox and guiding it through "a critical period of change" following the Activision Blizzard buyout in 2022. She went on to share her belief that the moment has been "navigated" and Xbox's gaming division is ready for "what comes next.""With that, I've decided this is the right time for me to take my next step, both personally and professionally," wrote Bond. "We're living through a transformative technological era that will shape the next generation of our industry, and I'm energized by what's ahead. This moment also presents a unique opportunity for fresh eyes and new leadership to guide the team into its next chapter."Continue Reading at GameSpot

She went on to share her belief that the moment has been "navigated" and Xbox's gaming division is ready for "what comes next.""With that, I've decided this is the right time for me to take my next step, both personally and professionally," wrote Bond. "We're living through a transformative technological era that will shape the next generation of our industry, and I'm energized by what's ahead. This moment also presents a unique opportunity for fresh eyes and new leadership to guide the team into its next chapter."Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Saints Row Director Believes The Franchise Is Dead
articles.title_tr: Saints Row Director Believes The Franchise Is Dead
articles.summary: Last year, Chris Stockman--the original design director for Saints Row--told fans that he was working on a pitch to return the franchise to its roots. Now, Stockman isn't holding out much hope for a revival and believes the franchise is "dead."Stockman made his original remarks on Discord, which have since been posted on X (via Eurogamer). "I think the franchise is dead, unfortunately," wrote Stockman. "I get the sense that Embracer has zero ability to do anything with it. I wish things were different. I tried my best to offer a path forward, but they've ghosted me."Remember when we got excited about the prospect of a Saints Row prequel? Well according to Saints Row 1 Design Director Chris Stockman, Embracer is completely ignoring the idea.Saints Row is once again dead. https://t.co/cpPVcRjxwD pic.twitter.com/FWpjC6kmkT  — rpg! (@papaRPG) February 20, 2026              The most recent game in the series was the 2022 Saints Row reboot, which under-performed compared to its predecessors. In 2023, Saints Row developer Volition was shut down by Embracer, and there's been no concrete news about the franchise since that time.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: AB'den Trump'a tarife tepkisi: Anlaşmaya sadık kalın
articles.title_tr: AB'den Trump'a tarife tepkisi: Anlaşmaya sadık kalın
articles.summary: Avrupa Birliği, ticaret ilişkilerinde öngörülebilirliğin korunması gerektiğini vurgulayarak ABD’den gümrük tarifeleri konusunda daha şeffaf hareket etmesini ve taraflar arasında varılan ticaret anlaşmalarındaki yükümlülüklere bağlı kalmasını talep etti. Yapılan açıklamada, tek taraflı adımların küresel ticaret dengelerini olumsuz etkileyebileceği belirtilirken, mevcut anlaşmaların uygulanmasının ekonomik istikrar ve karşılıklı güven açısından kritik önem taşıdığı ifade edildi.

articles.summary_tr: South Africa underline their credentials as serious challengers for the T20 World Cup with victory against co-hosts and defending champions India.

possible_impacts: Lig sıralamaları ve rekabet dengeleri değişebilir

articles.title: Uygulamalarda Yaş Sınırı Dönemi Resmen Başladı!
articles.title_tr: Uygulamalarda Yaş Sınırı Dönemi Resmen Başladı!
articles.summary: Mobil uygulamalarda dijital güvenlik ve yaş kısıtlaması politikaları giderek daha sıkı ve otomatik bir hale gelmeye başladı. Son dönemde kullanıcılar, uygulamaların yaş sınırlarını nasıl ele aldığı konusunda sistem düzeyinde önemli değişiklikler fark ediyor. Apple’ın iCloud altyapısı, kullanıcıların yaşını doğrudan sistem ayarları üzerinden güvenli bir şekilde doğrulamak için artık aktif olarak kullanılıyor. Dünyanın En Küçük Karekodu: […]

articles.title: Grönland, ABD'nin hastane gemisini istemedi
articles.title_tr: Grönland, ABD'nin hastane gemisini istemedi
articles.summary: Grönland Başbakanı Jens Frederik Nielsen, ABD Başkanı Donald Trump'ın "hastalara hizmet sunulması için" Grönland'a bir hastane gemisi göndereceklerini açıklaması üzerine böyle bir gemi istemediklerini, ücretsiz sağlık sistemlerinin bulunduğunu söyledi.
articles.summary_tr: Grönland Başbakanı Jens Frederik Nielsen, ABD Başkanı Donald Trump'ın "hastalara hizmet sunulması için" Grönland'a bir hastane gemisi göndereceklerini açıklaması üzerine böyle bir gemi istemediklerini, ücretsiz sağlık sistemlerinin bulunduğunu söyledi.

articles.title: Armed man killed after entering secure perimeter of Trump's residence, Secret Service says
articles.title_tr: Armed man killed after entering secure perimeter of Trump's residence, Secret Service says
articles.summary: The suspect was carrying a shotgun and fuel can when he was killed, officers said. Trump was in Washington DC at the time.

articles.title: Greenland says 'no thanks' to Trump US hospital boat
articles.title_tr: Greenland says 'no thanks' to Trump US hospital boat
articles.summary: Greenland's PM reminded Trump of its free healthcare, after Trump said he was sending a boat to aid people who were allegedly "not being taken care of".
articles.summary_tr: Greenland's PM reminded Trump of its free healthcare, after Trump said he was sending a boat to aid people who were allegedly "not being taken care of".
